overview: Follow the Cumbres & Toltec Scenic Railroad from Antonito, Colorado to Chama, New Mexico. Enjoy visions of golden October trees, snow, steam and smoke as you listen to music composed by Michael Lynch and follow this respected locomotive along one of the most rugged railroad lines in the country.
tagline: Ride One of America's Most Beautiful and Historic Railroads
title: Cumbres and Toltec Scenic Railroad
